home.section_intro: In this section you will find very useful tools for your well-being. From the menu, you can access a variety of resources such as books and meditations, as well as the option to request personal sessions.

books.title: Here you will find a selection of my books

meditations.title: Meditations
meditations.subtitle: I created this space during the pandemic to gift moments of harmony and calm. Today, I share it with you

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.subtitle: Explore my personalized sessions and transform your holistic well-being
